title: If this shit gonna pass pbe?...

replies.body:
"Hey guys, we noticed a bug that was allowing players to have fun in League of Legends, but don't worry we think this Xin Zhao change will fix that."

--rito

So, not only did some stuff get changed, we also found a bug where the AP ratio got doubled to 1.4 on accident... Most of the crazy healing in this video is coming from that. Fixed in tomorrow's build!
i dont know if you forgot but {{item:3931}} {{item:3124}} these are things in this game that will break him even with a 0.7 ratio....
This explains a lot of things.

I think I have a bug with lee sin
He's doing 10x the damage he should be
c:
kepo
Tell me the new broken as hell AD assassin item won't be released. Also tell me these insane AP item costs are going to be reduced...
He has 19 kills at 21 mins...great video.
He solo'd baron at level 16 with 2 items
A fed yi can also solo baron at 20 mins its not a big deal

> [{quoted}](name=NotClarkolas,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FAqKkxRN,comment-id=000200000002,timestamp=2016-02-01T17:33:21.057+0000)
>
> A fed yi can also solo baron at 20 mins its not a big deal

he had only 2 items ,you call that feed?

there is to be said that if Xin is fed then his level is above the average, meaning that Nashor' s actual level is way lower.

Probably is still big, but again xin has a "in the face" kit so for a champion like him it would be """"normal"""" to do such feats, like Olaf or Tryndamere.

but he had 19 kills and its his devour is fully stacked 

this is like the worst case scenario xin
kills don't equal stats. He had about 18 kills worth of unspent gold, meaning he was essentially the same as a xin without those kills
kills = sated

Kills = level
Kills = weak opponents who don't contest

..... I think you missed the point. The point wasnt that he could fight lower lever champions. The point was that he could kill Baron with two items, who is meant to be killed by a whole team, and the few champions that can solo him, need to be near full build, while xin, on the other hand, is able to do it with 2.
I tested it on pbe. Nonfed xin can solo nash with around 20 stacks and rageblade at 20 min
its not that he has 19 kills its taht he did it with 2 items at level 16

> [{quoted}](name=Snake Town,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FAqKkxRN,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-02-01T16:24:34.984+0000)
>
> He solo'd baron at level 16 with 2 items

look at how fed he is and nunu can solo baron with max q and 2 items? theres plenty of champions that can solo baron like yi and shyvana as well hes just really fed in that game

> [{quoted}](name=Godlike Jungle,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FAqKkxRN,comment-id=000200000006,timestamp=2016-02-01T20:50:08.234+0000)
>
> look at how fed he is and nunu can solo baron with max q and 2 items? theres plenty of champions that can solo baron like yi and shyvana as well hes just really fed in that game

18 Kills worth of Gold were unspent, probably more because since they were feeding him, they would be worth less gold, HE ISN'T FED! THATS LIKE SAYING A TRYNDAMERE with 12012 Gold is Fed and OP when he hasn't even spent it

It's like this. 
Whenever you think: " This is completly nuts, this will never go beyond PBE. " - It's going to happen, no doubt.
Whenever you think: " Okay, I like this, it makes sense." - It's going to be removed from PBE after 2 days.

This new mechanic will make riven and lee fair to play whats not to li-

riot: Removed from PBE due to not working out, since PBE is a test realm it is to be expected

4 days later

Riot: we got this new morde rework out check it!

Every player even the ones who dont play morde, this sucks, so bad don't release

rito: sorry guys stuff on the pbe is locked down and has to go to live

you know that this is no ture what you say
morde had a rework on the PBE already around the time where veigar was changed due to DFG
it was reverted because the PBE community said it sucked

No... it was just like he said. 
*Morde Rework* We hate it Rito, please just let us keep him!
Riot: Change **MORE SHIT** you say? Well we wouldn't want to disappoint.
Everyone: No please, don't put it through!
Riot: Listen, they're cheering.
Already has good sustain in his kit and ranged abilities to contest bot lane without a terrible experience gimmick? That's so Yorick.

> [{quoted}](name=Master Nami,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FAqKkxRN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-01T15:43:34.643+0000)
>
> Them got good english skills.

Probably not be their first language.

> [{quoted}](name=Master Nami,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FAqKkxRN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-01T15:43:34.643+0000)
>
> Them got good english skills.

sue me

> [{quoted}](name=CppL,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FAqKkxRN,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-02-01T15:48:54.922+0000)
>
> sue me

That edit tho.

> [{quoted}](name=The Poetic Zed,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FAqKkxRN,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-02-01T15:51:30.973+0000)
>
> That edit tho.

didint want to sound like ass ,thats why i edit.And pls just stop offtopic
I'm more scared of the new assassin item. What good will come from putting zed's ultimate on an item.
So Talon is now an AOE version of Zed............great.
{{champion:8}} Yo.

wtf are you even talking about zed and talon both have the same amount of aoe as each other 2 skills worth of aoe. Both their aoe pretty much does the same amount of damage. So how is talon a aoe version or zed when zed is talon 2.0 to begin with. zed is a updated version of talon with 2 free anywhere dashes and a invincible whenever he chooses.

You are joking right? Talon has much stronger and more reliable AOE than Zed does. With this item Talon will insta assassinate the entire team. He'll be perma ban status if this item doesn't get nerfed before it goes through. Zed is getting nerfed anyway, this item will be good on him but not as obnoxious as it is on Talon.

>With this item Talon will insta assassinate the entire team. 

Afraid the item doesn't work like that.

>UNIQUE Passive: Basic Attacks on an enemy champion apply Nightfall (120 second cooldown). 

It'll just make him able to kill someone easier when behind.
Hush with your actual game knowledge. We're too busy running around like chickens with our heads cut off because we see some sort of assassin buff.

\> running around
\>heads cut off

Sounds about right.

> [{quoted}](name=The Poetic Zed,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FAqKkxRN,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-02-01T15:46:15.910+0000)
>
> I'm more scared of the new assassin item. What good will come from putting zed's ultimate on an item.

Zed Nerfs.

Ya the tower and baron solo'ing are bullshit.

But why even include the Udyr kill? It was a fucking devourer AP udyr with zero tank items...
probably to show off the stupid level of healing even after being burst down like that

> [{quoted}](name=Lordnewb,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FAqKkxRN,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-02-01T17:39:23.565+0000)
>
> Ya the tower and baron solo'ing are bullshit.
> 
> But why even include the Udyr kill? It was a fucking devourer AP udyr with zero tank items...

I think it is because Xin only fought back when he had like 20% health and killed Udyr in a second.
After seeing multiple patches come about, I've decided the PBE is trash.
No, it's not the PBE, or at least the people on PBE. The PBE itself is useless because Rito just doesn't give a shit on what Feedback they get from it

People are acting like the Sated part makes a difference. Good Devourer junglers get sated by 20 min. A good friend of mine averages 16 min on sated, fastest ever was 12:37

Meaning this shit is scary and yall should be scared, not downplaying this video
Xin Zhao is always a fucking cancer, i can't understand why is he being buffed.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SlDqcjEjm6I
Oh my god i knew this was bad but not this bad. This is like a sick joke.

Riot's Balance team at their Best.

{{champion:36}} Mundo Pleased!
